solution_line_template: Three units require a running current of {running_current_per_unit}A each for a total current load of {num_units}*{running_current_per_unit}A = <<{num_units}*{running_current_per_unit}={total_running_current}>>{total_running_current}A

They require twice {total_running_current}A for starting which is {starting_current_multiplier}*{total_running_current}A = <<{starting_current_multiplier}*{total_running_current}={minimum_current_load}>>{minimum_current_load}A which is the minimum current load that the transformer must be able to carry
